pullRequest.title: Return setLocationShared and setRequiresUserPrivacyConsent methods
pullRequest.bodyText:
Keep remote param methods logic
Add logic to avoid user methods override remote params when available

for reference: OneSignal/OneSignal-iOS-SDK#707


This change is

commit.message:
Return setLocationShared and setRequiresUserPrivacyConsent methods

  * Keep remote param methods logic
  * Mark as deprecated setLocationShared and setRequiresUserPrivacyConsent

nodes.bodyText:
Let's remove the @Deprecated.
Normally @Deprecated annotation should only be added if there is a replacement already available for it. This is true however in this SDK code base but it won't be available on the dashboard until sometime after the major release.
